Author: erdos2
Content:
The blurb reads, "Authors Tim Ferriss (4-Hour Workweek) and Marcia Alboher (One Person/Multiple Careers) give an hour-long talk at Google about how to retire immediately or have multiple careers simultaneously."

My question is: given that their talk was one hour, what did they each do with the remaining three hours of their work week?

Author: nostrademons
Content: If nobody reads it, you're out the 30 seconds it takes to post.  I'll take that bargain...
